ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1571 â€“ Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1571 - FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to use the L-leucine as a lubricant and/or binder in the production of table-top sweetener tablets containing sucralose, at a maximum level of use of 10% of tablet weight; and Carboxymethyl cellulose, cross-linked (also called Sodium carboxymethyl cellulose, cross-linked), to be used for tablet disintegration in table-top sweetener tablets containing sucralose, at a maximum level of use of 2% of tablet weight.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0044 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
AttachmentsAttachment
